video_urls_yaml_url = (
    'https://gist.githubusercontent.com/x0s/2015a7e58d8d3f885b6528d33cd10b2d/raw/'
    )
with urllib.request.urlopen(video_urls_yaml_url) as video_urls_yaml:
    urls = yaml.safe_load(video_urls_yaml)
for dest, url in urls.items():
    vid = pafy.new(url)
    stream = vid.getbest()
    print(f'Downloading {stream.get_filesize() / 1000000.0:.2f} MB')
    stream.download((path_to_videos / dest).as_posix())
